rules.description: Turn the left key into the mute button

to.shell_command: if [ $(ps aux | grep -v grep | grep -ci "Microsoft Teams.app/Contents/Frameworks/Microsoft Teams Helper.app") -gt 0 ]; then osascript -e 'activate application id "com.microsoft.teams"' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "m" using {command down, shift down}'; fi
